*
#·Äê·Äõ
China will host the Shanghai Cooperation Orgranization Summit in Tianjin from 31-8-2025 to 1-9-2025
#·Ä°
 
The summit will also be attended by Russian President Vladimir Putin, the Secretary-General of the United Nations and elders from more than 20 countries, and other negotiating countries, including India, have also been invited, and Myanmar is a partner country starting in 2023. 
#·Ä°
The SCO is led by China to economically compete with the European Union and Western bloc countries; It is
 a strong and important economic bloc in the region

text_snippet:
Chairman of the Mandalay Solidarity and Development Party met with youth party members from the townships of Mandalay
 Province=================================
August 20, 2025, Chairman of the Mandalay
Solidarity and Development Party, along with Vice Chairman and Central Executives, Dr. Meng Thien, Chairman of the Mandalay Regional Party, and Chairman of the Mandalay Regional Party, Tong Hao Mo, on the afternoon of August 20, 2025.The ceremony was held at the Provincial Party Hall, attended the meeting with the youth of the Party, the youth around the Party and the youth who were interested in the activities of the Party.The
 ceremony was opened with the national flag hoisted, and the Party Chairman and Vice Chairman explained to the attending youth the formation of the Party, the formation of the Party, the characteristics and activities of the Party, and the aspirations. Afterwards, the youth in attendance asked about the role of youth and women, empowerment, access to employment opportunities, the importance of an election in a country, issues related to elections, and future educational roles, which were answered by the party president, vice president and central executives.
It was reported that the meeting was attended by the Chairman of the Party for the Strength and Development of the Union, Dr. Meng Thien, the Chairman of the Party of the People's Republic of China, the Chairman of the Party of Manta Province, the Chairman of the Party of Manta Province, the Chairman of the Provincial Committee, the district chairmen, the youth of the Party members of the 10 townships, the youth of the Party and the youth who were interested in the activities of the Party.
locations: members from the townships of Mandalay
of the 10 townships, the youth
